snippet: At Barclays Center in Brooklyn, Neil Young showed that he may not perceive clichés at all, like a kind of color blindness.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by Neil Young at Barclays Center.
lead_paragraph: At Barclays Center in Brooklyn, Neil Young showed that he may not perceive clichés at all, like a kind of color blindness.

headline.seo: Neil Young and Crazy Horse at Barclays Center
headline.main: An Endeavor to Discover Some Truths in the Trite
headline.print_headline: An Endeavor To Discover Some Truths In the Trite
